verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> or Song <WH7892> for the sons <WH1121> of Korah. <WH7141> His foundation <WH3248> is in the holy <WH6944> mountains. <WH2042>
The LORD <WH3068> loveth <WH157> the gates <WH8179> of Zion <WH6726> more than all <WH4480> <WH3605> the dwellings <WH4908> of Jacob. <WH3290>
Glorious things <WH3513> are spoken <WH1696> of thee, O city <WH5892> of God. <WH430> Selah. <WH5542>

I will make mention <WH2142> of Rahab <WH7294> and Babylon <WH894> to them that know <WH3045> me: behold <WH2009> Philistia, <WH6429> and Tyre, <WH6865> with <WH5973> Ethiopia; <WH3568> this <WH2088> man was born <WH3205> there. <WH8033>
And of Zion <WH6726> it shall be said, <WH559> This <WH376> and that man <WH376> was born <WH3205> in her: and the highest <WH5945> himself <WH1931> shall establish <WH3559> her.
The LORD <WH3068> shall count, <WH5608> when he writeth up <WH3789> the people, <WH5971> that this <WH2088> man was born <WH3205> there. <WH8033> Selah. <WH5542>
As well the singers <WH7891> as the players on instruments <WH2490> shall be there: all <WH3605> my springs <WH4599> are in thee.
